attributes.action: Get Dave back in as the DJ in the Old Red Lion Whinmoor Leeds
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Old Red Lion has become very boring on Saturday nights since the landlord Chris has stopped DJ Deadog from spinning his disc's. The DJ he has employed is very bad (when he turns up) and will not play requests and never speaks.
If you care about this please sign this petition. 
Thanks.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
